data.title: CutPrintFilm.com
data.text:
Backed up by excellent cameos from Martin Balsam, Telly Savalas and Polly Bergen, Cape Fear also features one of Bernard Herrmann's finest scores, a complete ...

In the original film, Sam Bowden was a good man trying to defend his family from a madman. In the Scorsese version, Bowden is flawed and guilty, ...

As it turns out, Cape Fear is a film that follows Scorsese's usual themes, mainly guilt. Nick Nolte suffers from it, and Robert DeNiro helps to amplify the ...

Cape Fear (1991) is a great film. Robert De Niro just nails the role of Max Cady in this. Great story, great acting and very creepy. 5 stars from me.

Cape Fear is one of his best movies after Goodfellas, The King of Comedy, Taxi Driver, Mean Streets, The Departed, Raging Bull, The Irishman, ...

De Niro is laughably bad and a total caricature and the film is filled with ludicrous moments and Terrible editing and camera work.
